title: Is it bad that I listen to sad songs to cry? - Quora

response.answer_text: that is not bad at all. sometimes i feel so pressured with my emotions and i can’t cry alone. so i just listen to sad songs to release the tension and it makes me feel better. listening to sad music and crying can give you a sense of relief.

I think it depends on how much you do it. If you listen to too many sad songs, it can make you depressed, but it’s okay every once in a while. In fact, it can even be good for you to have a good cry when needed. God bless :)
